data.text: I will always thank Yahweh;
I will boast about what Yahweh has done.
Join with me in telling others that Yahweh is great!
I prayed to Yahweh, and he ◄answered my prayer/did what I asked him to do►;
Those who trust [IDM] that he will help them will be joyful;
I was miserable/helpless, but I called out to Yahweh, and he heard me.
An angel from Yahweh guards those who revere him,
Find out for yourself, and you will experience that Yahweh is good to you!
All you who belong to him, revere him!
Lions are usually very strong, but sometimes even young lions are hungry and become weak,
You ◄who are my students/whom I teach►, come and listen to me,
If [RHQ] any of you wants to enjoy life
do not say anything that is evil!
Turn away from doing evil, and do what is good!
Yahweh [MTY] carefully watches over those who act righteously;
But Yahweh [SYN] ◄is opposed to/turns away from► those who do what is evil.
Yahweh hears righteous people when they call out to him;
Yahweh is always ready to help those who are discouraged;
Righteous people may have many troubles,
Yahweh protects them from being harmed;
Wicked people will be killed by their own evil deeds (OR, by people doing to them the same evil things that the wicked do to others) [PRS],
Yahweh will save those who serve him.
